aka: Together the Heart is Never Wrong

cast.name: 埃米利奥·奥索里奥 Emilio Osorio

trans_title: Together the Heart is Never Wrong
introduction: The new follows Aris and Temo as they move to Mexico City to go to university and continue to be as dramatic as all the fan-made YouTube videos I binged before writing this article have led me to believe they are. Here’s a pretty good summary of their story together thus far, set to some piano backing that’s as appropriately extra and romantic as the goddamn teenage heart!It made Mexican television history, Reuters reports, becoming the first telenovela in the country to feature a gay couple as its leading characters.
